Name: Share
Description: Collections of files for use with permissions groups.

Attributes.Name: Groups
Attributes.Description: Object containing ACL sets for the share.

Definition.Name: Read
Definition.Description: List of UUID's that identify groups with read access.

Definition.Name: Write
Definition.Description: List of UUID's that identify groups with write access.

Attributes.Name: Files
Attributes.Description: List of UUID's that represent files in the share.
